    All Classes and Interfaces

    Class
    Description
    App
     
    CoinbaseWebSocketClient
    A WebSocket client for subscribing to real-time ticker data from Coinbase's WebSocket API.
    Constants
    The Constants class holds fixed values used across the trading algorithm, including statistical thresholds and trading cost assumptions.
    DataFetcher
    The DataFetcher class is responsible for fetching live market data from the Coinbase WebSocket API.
    HistoricalDataFetcher
    The HistoricalDataFetcher class is responsible for fetching historical market price data for a given cryptocurrency from the CoinGecko API.
    MeanReversionStrategy
    A strategy for pairs trading based on mean reversion of the spread between two time series.
    OLSUtils
    Utility class for performing Ordinary Least Squares (OLS) linear regression.
    PairsTrade
    The PairsTrade class represents a pairs trade involving two coins or assets.
    PairsTradeLedger
    The PairsTradeLedger class represents a collection of PairsTrade objects.
    PairsTrader
    The PairsTrader class manages the backtesting of a pairs trading strategy.
    PairsTradingSignal
    Represents a trading signal in a pairs trading strategy.
    PairsTradingSignal.SignalType
    Enum that defines the different types of trading signals.
    PairsTradingStrategy
    Abstract class that represents a general pairs trading strategy.
    ProductData
    The ProductData class represents the price data of a specific cryptocurrency product.
    RegressionResult
    Holds the result of a simple linear regression.
    ShortTrade
    The ShortTrade class represents a short sale of an asset.
    StatisticalTests
    Provides statistical tests and utilities for analyzing time series data, including cointegration testing, ADF test statistic computation, and spread calculation.
    TickerData
    The TickerData class extends ArrayList and represents a collection of ProductData objects that store the price information for various cryptocurrency products.
    TickerDataGrapher
    Utility class for graphing time series data, specifically the price and return data from a list of TickerData objects, using JavaFX LineChart.
    TimeSeriesUtils
    Provides utility functions for time series analysis, including calculations for returns, mean, standard deviation, correlation, percentiles, and more.
    Trade
    The Trade class represents a generic trade of an asset, including the asset being traded, the number of shares, purchase price, and the trading fee.
    WebsiteFX
    The WebsiteFX class is a JavaFX application that serves as the main entry point for the QuaCooker user interface.
    WebsiteFXController
    The WebsiteFXController class is the controller for the JavaFX-based user interface of the QuaCooker application.
